Phase 2: ConsensusMemory (P1): Track settled vs contested topics
Phase 4: PromptEvolver (P9): Prompt evolution from winning patterns
Phase 5: ConvergenceDetector (P11): Early stopping via semantic convergence
MetaCritiqueAnalyzer (P12): Debate process feedback and recommendations
Phase 6: ClaimsKernel (P16): Structured typed claims with evidence tracking
BeliefNetwork (P18): Probabilistic reasoning over uncertain claims
Phase 7: EnhancedProvenanceManager (P21): Staleness detection for living documents
DebateTracer (P25): Audit logs and deterministic replay
Phase 8: PersonaLaboratory (P26): A/B testing, emergent traits, cross-pollination
SemanticRetriever (P27): Pattern matching for similar critiques
FormalVerificationManager (P28): Z3 theorem proving for logical claims
DebateGraph (P29): DAG-based debates for complex disagreements

integration_status: Phase 8 complete - ~99% of features now integrated
